name: CarrierSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on <your air purifier name>.”
”Alexa, turn on the light on <your air monitor name>.”
”Alexa, what's the air quality on <your device name>.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: carrier smart home
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Carrier SmartHome skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now interact with your Carrier air purifier and air monitor through voice commands.
Begin by tapping on the "Enable to use" button above and enter your Carrier Home app login details.

Here are some of the actions you can take with your Carrier air purifiers and monitors:

1. Turn the air purifier ON/OFF

You can say, "Alexa, turn off <air purifier name>."


2. Check the air quality on your air monitor

You can say, "Alexa, what's the air quality on <air monitor name>."


Note: When using the above commands, replace the words <air purifier name> and <air monitor name> with the corresponding device name that is defined in your Carrier Home app.
